author: jacopoc
msg: Added ability to create new shipment groups to an existing order. This also fixes a bug mentioned in one of the comments to "OFBIZ-1809" (duplicated ship groups were assigned to newly created items when they were not assigned to the first ship group). Misc code formatting fixes that I did while wading thru the code.
